original: 鄭嫗善相，劉敦善星象，吳范善候風氣，趙達善算，嚴武善棋，宋壽善占夢，皇象善書，曹不興善畫。
text: Zheng Yu is good looking, Liu Dunshan is good at astrology, Wu Fan is good at weather, Zhao Da is good at calculating, Yan Wu is good at chess, Song Shoushan is good at dreaming, the emperor is good at book, Cao Buxing is good at painting.
